bo

Class PersistentObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • bo.PersistentObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollectionAnalytics, Serializable

    public class PersistentObject
extends Object
implements Serializable, CollectionAnalytics
    Serializable class that can be used to store a collection of PopulationRecords.
    Author:
    Brady Houseknecht
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
